basic.blooming: Flowering period April-June, fruiting period September-November
basic.color: Flower color light yellow, yellow, yellow green, fruit color white

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like adequate light, insufficient light can cause low fruit production
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries
maintenance.fertilization: Apply adequate base fertilizers before transplanting, apply liquid fertilizers once to twice monthly then
maintenance.pruning: Thin branches timely, keep more side branches for better fruit setting
